revenue: SELECT "storeID", "purchaseDate"::DATE AS day, SUM("total") AS sum FROM purchase WHERE "purchaseDate" >= $1 GROUP BY "storeID", day ORDER BY day DESC
revenues: SELECT "storeID", "purchaseDate"::DATE AS day, SUM("total") AS sum FROM purchase WHERE "purchaseDate" >= $1 AND "storeID" = ANY($2) GROUP BY "storeID", day ORDER BY day DESC
